testimonials.text: One of the Greate Web Developer I have met, we had done one Freelancing Project togather and belive me he is best you can have in your team.

That Shailesh Parmar must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
